page.title: 19Railways in Cathcart
page.content: There are two railway stations in blocks 58oo 6ooo, 58oo 61oo Cathcart and Mount Florida. These stations are for trains which runs within the Glasgow area and there are two different services. One operates between Glasgow Central and Neilston, the other is a circular route from and to Glasgow Central. Daily 36 trains pass Cathcart Station going to Neilston (no trains on a Sunday), 37 from Neilston (none on a Sunday), 18 trains from Central Station via Shawlands and 18 in the opposite direction (none on a Sunday). In a survey it was found that the trains were used mainly by women, the people generally use the trains once or twice a week and that they are happy with the service provided. The service is used by people who are going to work or going shopping.
